data.persona: I enjoy working in the sun. I was raised that hard work pays off. My cabbages are the best in the village.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The old rustic barn was settled on the outermost edge of the farm.  Standing tall over the fields, this two-story red barn cast a long shadow over the field surrounding it.  Large wooden doors that could be propped open with great effort would lead you directly inside.
There's a feed, a door, a blanket, a hay, and a Tack for the work horses here.
The guest and the garter snake are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to finish my chores
data.long_motivation: I must ensure the horse has its strength for when it carries my cart to market
